meanings.definition: Provide with an incentive or motivation.
meanings.sent1: She incentivized her employees with a bonus for meeting their targets.
meanings.sent2: The company incentivized customers to buy more by offering discounts.
meanings.sent3: The teacher incentivized the students with a pizza party for completing their homework.
meanings.sent4: The coach incentivized the team by promising them a day off if they won the championship.
meanings.sent5: The parents incentivized their children to clean their rooms by promising a trip to the zoo.

meanings.sent1: The music incentivized her to dance with joy.
meanings.sent2: The speaker incentivized the audience to take action through his powerful speech.
meanings.sent3: The smell of freshly baked cookies incentivized him to bake his own batch.
meanings.sent4: The beautiful scenery incentivized her to start painting again.
meanings.sent5: The success of her friend incentivized her to pursue her own dreams.
